intro: Take the wheel of more than 21 buses across 7 unique cities, inspired by real-life locations! Drive diesel, hybrid, electric, double-decker, articulated and school buses!
description:
Bus Driving Simulator 24 - City Roads puts you in the driver’s seat and lets you become a real Bus Driver! Featuring detailed maps all over the world, a wide variety of modern city buses and school buses with realistic interiors and a groundbreaking 1:1 physics engine.

Get behind the wheel and drive your bus to complete all the 70 routes! Drive a diesel, hybrid, electric, articulated, double decker or school bus and customize your bus as you wish.

Features:

• A total of 21 buses to choose from, including 4 diesel, 5 hybrid, 5 electric, 4 articulated, 2 school buses and 1 double-decker (more available as DLC)
• Realistic city maps: United States of America (San Francisco), South America (Buenos Aires), Europe (Germany - Berlin, United Kingdom - London, Czech Republic - Prague), UAE (Dubai), China (Shanghai)
• Career and Free-ride modes
• Lots of bus customization options including paint, accessories, body parts, air conditioning, flags, decals and many more
• Detailed and customizable interiors
• Open/Close Doors button, animated people entering/exiting the bus
• Choose from 6 combinations of time-of-day and weather conditions, featuring midday, sunset, night, and either rainy or clear skies
• Drive kids to school using school bus models
• Bus company management system with hired drivers for your buses and custom route scheduling
• Intelligent Traffic System

Become the best bus driver in the world with Bus Driving Simulator 24 - City Roads!
